resources.description:
Returns trending tokens across the entire blockchain for a specified activity window and optional category.
The size of the increase in active wallets over the activity window determines the token's trending rank.

accepts.description:
Returns trending tokens across the entire blockchain for a specified activity window and optional category.
The size of the increase in active wallets over the activity window determines the token's trending rank.

activity_window.description: The length of time over which activity is measured.

category.description: Filters to a specific subset of tokens. Currently only 'virtuals' is supported on Base.

estimate_cost.description: When true, returns only the SLAM token cost estimation.

num.description: The maximum number of tokens to return. Maximum: 250.

block.description: The block number at which this data snapshot was generated

chain.description: The name of the blockchain network (e.g., 'base')

slam.description: The SLAM token cost for this API call

tokens.description: List of trending tokens for the specified activity window and category

fdv.description: The tokens fully diluted valuation in USD

block.description: The block number of the first mint

hash.description: The transaction hash of the first mint

utc.description: The UTC timestamp of the mint (ISO 8601 format)

liquidity.description: The liquidity value for the token in USD

name.description: The full name of the token

rank.description: The tokens trending rank, determined by change in active wallets.

cur.description: The current token price in USD

utc.description: The UTC timestamp of the block used for the response (ISO 8601 format)

handle.description: X handle (username) without the @ prefix, for example WURKDOTFUN or statikheadz.
Normalized X handle that was requested.

price_usdc.description: Fixed price charged for this call in USDC (6 decimals).

profile.description: Full upstream X profile payload for the user, including core fields like id, rest_id, name, screen_name, description, avatar, location and counters.

tweet_count.description: Number of recent tweets returned (up to 10).

tweets.description: Array of up to 10 recent tweets with trimmed but useful metadata: id, text (max 3000 chars; longer texts are truncated), created_at, language, basic user info, engagement metrics, media and links.

resources.description: Base  Solana USDC microbridge discovery. Default example uses 1.00 USDC deposited to the Base bridge wallet. Provide a Solana receiver address and an amount (min 0.01 USDC, max 50.00 USDC, steps of 0.01) to create a concrete bridge quote. The bridge charges a 2.5% commission; the remainder is delivered as USDC on Solana.

accepts.description: Base  Solana USDC microbridge discovery. Default example uses 1.00 USDC deposited to the Base bridge wallet. Provide a Solana receiver address and an amount (min 0.01 USDC, max 50.00 USDC, steps of 0.01) to create a concrete bridge quote. The bridge charges a 2.5% commission; the remainder is delivered as USDC on Solana.

amount.description: Amount in USDC to bridge from Base to Solana. Optional; minimum 0.01 USDC, maximum 50.00 USDC, steps of 0.01 USDC. When omitted, defaults to 1.00 USDC.

receiver.description: Destination Solana wallet address that should receive bridged USDC.

amount_out_usdc.description: USDC amount delivered on Solana after commission.

base_payment_txid.description: Base transaction hash of the bridge payment (x402 settlement).

bridge_id.description: Internal bridge id for support and debugging.

ok.description: True when the bridge completed (sent or refunded).

payer_wallet.description: Base wallet that paid the bridge x402 payment.

receiver_wallet.description: Solana wallet that should receive bridged USDC.

refund_txid.description: Base transaction hash of the refund when the bridge failed.

sol_txid.description: Solana transaction id of the USDC transfer to the receiver.

status.description: Bridge status: 'sent' when Solana transfer succeeded, 'refunded' when Base refund was sent, or 'failed' when both send and refund failed.

extra.name: USD Coin
extra.serviceDescription: x402Factory BaseSolana USDC microbridge for agents. Deposits USDC on Base and delivers USDC on Solana with a small commission.

code.description: The Python code to execute in the sandbox

results.description: The execution results from running the code

resources.description: Send messages to Telegram from your Base wallet. Ideal for agents and backends to communicate with the outside world. Cost: 0.001 USDC per call. Use action=create with a name to get a chat_key, then open t.me/x402Factory_bot and send /pair <chat_key> to activate. Use action=list to see your chat_keys. Use action=message (or omit action) with chat_key and at least a message or attachment to send a Telegram message. Supports Markdown v2 and optional attachment URLs (image/video/audio).

accepts.description: Send messages to Telegram from your Base wallet. Ideal for agents and backends to communicate with the outside world. Cost: 0.001 USDC per call. Use action=create with a name to get a chat_key, then open t.me/x402Factory_bot and send /pair <chat_key> to activate. Use action=list to see your chat_keys. Use action=message (or omit action) with chat_key and at least a message or attachment to send a Telegram message. Supports Markdown v2 and optional attachment URLs (image/video/audio).

action.description: Optional action. Use 'create' to create a new chat_key, 'list' to list chat_keys for the paying wallet, or 'message' to explicitly send a message. When omitted, the call is treated as action=message and enqueues a message for an existing chat_key.

attachment.description: Optional URL of an attachment (image, video, or mp3) stored along with the message.

chat_key.description: Chat key returned from action=create. Required when sending a message. Not used for action=create or action=list.

message.description: Message text in Markdown v2 format. When sending a message (action omitted or action=message), at least one of message or attachment is required. Not required for action=create or action=list.

name.description: Human-readable name to give to the Telegram bot/chat. Required for action=create. Ignored for other actions.

action.description: Action performed: 'create' for new chat_key, 'list' for listing chat_keys, 'message' when a message was enqueued.

activation_instructions.description: How to activate the Telegram bot for this chat_key (e.g. talk to t.me/x402Factory_bot and send /pair <chat_key>). Returned on create.

attachment.description: Attachment URL stored with the message, if any.

chat_id.description: Telegram chat_id associated with the chat_key once the background worker has linked it. Initially empty.

chat_key.description: Chat key created for this wallet (action=create) or used for message sends.

chats.description: For action=list: up to 100 recent chats for the paying wallet, each with chat_key, name, createdAt, updatedAt.

createdAt.description: Creation timestamp for the chat or message.

message_id.description: Identifier of the stored message row in the messages table.

name.description: Name associated with the chat_key (action=create or list).

tg_send_flag.description: Telegram send flag from the messages table. Initially empty; can be updated by a background worker.

updatedAt.description: Last update timestamp for the chat.

extra.name: USD Coin
extra.serviceDescription: x402Factory Base endpoints for agents (notes, LLMs, TTS, Telegram, coin prices, payments).

resources.description: Base coin price mini-endpoint for major tokens only. Returns spot prices and 24h stats for well-known tickers like btc, solana, eth, xmr, ltc and other large-cap coins, never microcaps. Pass an optional ticker to get a single-coin 24h snapshot with price, symbol, changeRate, changePrice, high and low, or omit ticker to receive a compact basket of top tokens in a fixed order. Cost: 0.001 USDC per request.

accepts.description: Base coin price mini-endpoint for major tokens only. Returns spot prices and 24h stats for well-known tickers like btc, solana, eth, xmr, ltc and other large-cap coins, never microcaps. Pass an optional ticker to get a single-coin 24h snapshot with price, symbol, changeRate, changePrice, high and low, or omit ticker to receive a compact basket of top tokens in a fixed order. Cost: 0.001 USDC per request.

ticker.description: Optional ticker symbol for a single major token (case-insensitive). Examples: btc, solana, eth, xmr, ltc. When omitted the endpoint returns a compact basket of top tokens instead.

changePrice.description: Absolute 24h price change over the recent period for the asset (single mode only).

changeRate.description: Relative 24h change rate over the recent period for the asset (single mode only).

high.description: 24h high price for the asset (single mode only).

low.description: 24h low price for the asset (single mode only).

mode.description: Result mode: 'single' when ticker is provided, 'top' when ticker is omitted.

price.description: Spot price for the asset, using the upstream best bid/last price in a stable quote asset.

prices.description: For mode='top': ordered array of { ticker, symbol, price } for a fixed basket of major tokens, in the order: btc, solana, eth, xmr, bnb, xrp, trx, doge, ada, bch, hype, link, leo, xlm, zec, ltc, avax, hbar, dai, shib, ton, mnt, wlfi, cro.

symbol.description: Upstream trading symbol for the asset (e.g. BTC-USDT for single mode, or base asset symbol like BTC in the top basket).

ticker.description: Normalized lower-case ticker that was resolved (single mode only).

extra.name: USD Coin
extra.serviceDescription: x402Factory Base endpoints for agents (notes, LLMs, TTS, Telegram, coin prices, payments).

expiresAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session expires

paidMinutes.description: Number of minutes prepaid for this session

resources.description:
Returns current token prices with FDV, liquidity, and 24h price change, quoted in **USD**, **ETH**, or **BTC**.

### Rules
- Provide **either** `symbols` or `addresses`, not both.
- Max **30 entries** for either parameter (pipe-delimited).
- `quote_symbol` must be one of: `USD`, `ETH`, `BTC`.

accepts.description:
Returns current token prices with FDV, liquidity, and 24h price change, quoted in **USD**, **ETH**, or **BTC**.

### Rules
- Provide **either** `symbols` or `addresses`, not both.
- Max **30 entries** for either parameter (pipe-delimited).
- `quote_symbol` must be one of: `USD`, `ETH`, `BTC`.

addresses.description: Pipe-delimited list of token contract addresses (e.g., 0xabc...|0xdef...). Cannot be used with 'symbols'. Max 30 addresses.

estimate_cost.description: When true, only returns the SLAM token cost for this request. Does not include token price data.

quote_symbol.description: Quote token or currency to return prices in.

symbols.description: Pipe-delimited list of token symbols to query (e.g., SWARM|VADER). Cannot be used with 'addresses'. Max 30 symbols.

block.description: The block number for this price snapshot.

quote.description: Quote token or currency (USD, ETH, BTC).

slam.description: The SLAM token cost for this API call.

resources.name: CDP Facilitator
resources.description: Best-in-class x402 facilitator. Fee-free USDC settlement on Base Mainnet. KYT/OFAC checks on every transaction.

resources.name: Corbits
resources.description: A production grade facilitator which supports multi-network, multi-token, multi-payment schemes.

resources.name: Mogami facilitator
resources.description: A free, developer-focused, production-ready facilitator for x402 payments. Use it instantly online, or launch your own Docker image in seconds.

resources.name: OpenX402.ai Facilitator
resources.description: The first permissionless, gasless and omnichain x402 facilitator that any x402 server can use without login

resources.name: PayAI Facilitator
resources.description: Accept x402 payments on all networks including Avalanche, Base, Polygon, Sei, Solana, and more! Get started in less than 1 minute. Supports all tokens. No API Keys required.

resources.name: Treasure Facilitator
resources.description: Treasure x402 Facilitator available on Base and Base Sepolia. Supports EIP-3009 compliant tokens including USDC, MAGIC, SMOL, MIO, AI Frens tokens, and more.

resources.name: WorldFun Facilitator
resources.description: AWE World.funs x402 Facilitator enables fee-free EIP-3009 payments in USDC and other ERC-20 tokens, handling verification and settlement on Base so developers dont need blockchain infrastructure.

resources.name: x402.org Facilitator
resources.description: Default testnet facilitator for x402

resources.name: x402.rs Facilitator
resources.description: Independent, open-source facilitator in Rust. Easy to self-host, extend to new networks, or use via our hosted instance.
